Class-Alchemist 20 -- Female Skilled Human Alchemist: 20

Background: Artisan Deity: Nethys
Experience: 19481/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14

Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)

Alchemy: Has the Alchemical Crafting feature
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
General Training: +1 General Feat
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Research Field: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Heaven Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Piloting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Architecture Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Hunting Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Religion: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +25 (charisma; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Hunting Lore): Skill Legendary (Hunting Lore)
Additional Lore (Vampire Lore): Skill Legendary (Vampire Lore)
Advanced Efficient Alchemy: Has increased Advanced Alchemy effects
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Alchemist Skills: Skill Trained (Crafting; Choose 7 from any)
Bomber: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level bombs
Chirurgeon: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level healing elixirs
Double Brew: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Efficient Alchemy: Has increased Advanced Alchemy effects
Enduring Alchemy: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Improved Invigorating Elixir (Mental): Has increased Invigorating Elixir effects
Improved Invigorating Elixir (Physical): Has increased Invigorating Elixir effects
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Mutagenist: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level mutagens
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Ratfolk Lore): Skill Trained (Ratfolk Lore)
Skill Training (Stabling Lore): Skill Trained (Stabling Lore)
Skill Training (Swamp Lore): Skill Trained (Swamp Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Supreme Invigorating Elixir: Has increased Invigorating Elixir effects
Toxicologist: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level alchemical poisons
Advanced Alchemy: Can create 14 consumable infused alchemical items of up to level 20 without a Crafting check during daily prep
Advanced Vials (Bomber): Can make bombs with a special material trait
Advanced Vials (Chirurgeon): Does not need to wait between multiple uses of healing field vials on a creature that has fewer than half of its maximum Hit Points
Alchemical Assessment: Can use Crafting to Identify Alchemy on a held item in 1 action
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Alchemical Expertise: Gathering reagents during exploration regains 3 vials
Alchemy: Can automatically identify familiar alchemical items
Alter Admixture: Can use a 10 min process to change the type of an alchemical bomb, elixir, or poison
Chirurgeon: Can use Crafting in place of Medicine/Can use versatile vials to restore Hit Points equal to their initial damage to a willing target within 20' once per target per 10 min
Clotting Elixirs: Healing elixirs allow a DC 10 flat check to remove persistent bleed damage
Combine Elixirs: Uses the ingredients of 2 elixirs to create a single elixir that has the effects of both
Craft Philosopher's Stone: Knows the formula for creating a philosopher's stone
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Efficient Alchemy: Can produce twice the usual number of alchemical consumables during downtime
Eternal Elixir: Can indefinitely extend the duration of 1 elixir of up to level 10 that lasts at least 1 min
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Extend Elixir: Doubles the duration of elixirs that last at least 1 min
Field Discovery (Chirurgeon): Crafted healing elixirs give 4 temporary Hit Points for 1 min
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 52 alchemical formulas
Fortified Elixirs: Consumer of an infused antidote or antiplague can end its effects to reroll a failed Fortitude save vs. poison or disease
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist): Can use 2 polymorphic mutagens simultaneously
Improbable Elixirs: Can create elixirs that replicate the effects of 4 potions of up to level 9
Improvise Admixture: (1) Crafting check using an alchemist's toolkit creates 1, 2, or 3 versatile vials on a failure, success, or critical success once per day
Invigorating Elixir: Prepared elixirs can be imbibed by sickened creatures and attempt to counteract at rank 11 the imbiber's choice of petrified, stunned, any disease, confused, controlled, fleeing, frightened, blinded, deafened, drained, paralyzed, slowed, clumsy, enfeebled, sickened, or stupefied once per creature per 10 min
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Mutant Innervation: Cognitive mutagens boost Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, Medicine, Nature, Performance, Religion, and Survival and allow R60' telepathic communication; serene mutagens negate detection, revelation, and scrying effects up to rank 9; silvertongue mutagens negate circumstance penalties to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance and translate speech into listeners' languages
Mutant Physique: Bestial mutagens give an Intimidation bonus and increase claws and jaws damage die by 1 step and give them the deadly d10 trait; juggernaut mutagens give resistance 10 to physical damage; quicksilver mutagens give 10' Steps and Squeezing as 1 size smaller
Persistent Mutagen: Can extend the duration of a mutagen until next daily prep once per day
Quick Alchemy: (1) Creates 2 versatile vial bombs or research items that last until the end of the turn, or uses versatile vials to create 2 alchemical items of up to level 20 that last until the end of the next turn
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Soothing Vials: Versatile vials that restore Hit Points allow an immediate +1 Will saving throw to end 1 mental effect
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on selected type of item
Tenacious Toxins: Increases the duration of poisons by their stage 1 interval
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Unstable Concoction: Can increase the die size of the initial effects of a alchemical consumable by 1 step; the consumer must succeed on a DC 10 flat check or suffer acid damage equal to the item's level
Versatile Vials: Can create 10 versatile vials during daily prep
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (1 max); master) Class DC: Alchemist: 40 (intelligence; master)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Gauntlet (+30 1d4+4 B; strength; master); Lesser Acid Flask (+30 1 E R60'; dexterity; master); Longspear (+30 1d8+4 P; strength; master); Spear (+30 1d6+4 P R20'; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Alchemical Expertise: Class Expert (Alchemist)
Alchemical Mastery: Class Master (Alchemist)
Alchemical Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs; Unarmed Attacks)
Alchemical Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Lobber: Thrown bombs have a 30' range
Greater Debilitating Bomb: Has increased Debilitating Bomb effects
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Medium Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
True Debilitating Bomb: Has increased Debilitating Bomb effects
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs have a 60' range
Unconventional Weaponry (Blowgun): Weapon Familiarity (Blowgun)
Abundant Vials: Permanently quickened; can use the additional action only to use Quick Alchemy
Advanced Vials (Toxicologist): Poison vials also inflict persistent poison damage equal to their splash damage
Blowgun Poisoner: Poisoned blowgun Strikes apply injury poisons even if the target's resistance negates the attack damage, and critical successes with a poisoned blowgun Strike inflict 1 degree worse on the save/Successful Stealth vs. Perception when using a blowgun allows remaining hidden
Bomber: Can direct a bomb splash onto a single target/Can use versatile vials to inflict cold, electricity, or fire damage
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Debilitating Bomb: Can craft bombs to also inflict clumsy 1, stupefied 2, enfeebled 2, dazzled, deafened, off-guard, or -15 Speed (save Fortitude negates) until the start of the next turn
Directional Bombs: Can restrict bomb splash effects to a 20' cone
Double Poison: Can apply 2 poisons of up to level 18 to a weapon simultaneously
Expanded Splash: Can throw bombs to inflict +4 HP splash damage in a 10' radius
Exploitive Bomb: Can create bombs that negate resistance 20
Field Discovery (Bomber): Can throw a bomb to inflict 4 HP splash damage
Greater Field Discovery (Bomber): Can increase bomb splash radius to 15'
Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon): Created elixirs restore the maximum number of Hit Points
Greater Field Discovery (Toxicologist): Infused injury poisons can also affect an adjacent target
Healing Bomb: Successful ranged Strike with an elixir of life gives its effects to the target and restores Hit Points equal to the elixir's dice to adjacent creatures; failure restores Hit Points equal to the elixir's dice to the target only
Mega Bomb: Can create thrown bombs of up to level 17 that require 2 actions to throw and that affect all creatures in a 30' radius within 60' (save basic Reflex)
Miracle Worker: Can administer a true elixir of life that restores life with 1 HP and wounded 1 to a creature dead for up to 2 rd once per 10 min
Mutagenist: Using a mutagen gives 14 temporary Hit Points for 1 min or until the mutagen expires once per min
Perfect Debilitation: Debilitating Bombs require a critical success to avoid effects
Pernicious Poison: Specially-prepared poison inflicts HP equal to its level if the target saves
Pinpoint Poisoner: Off-guard targets suffer -2 initial saves vs. self poisoned weapons and inhaled poisons
Powerful Alchemy: Increases the DC for infused alchemical items to 40
Quick Bomber: (1) Draws or uses Quick Alchemy to create a bomb and Strikes with it
Regurgitate Mutagen: (1) R30' Ends the effects of a mutagen to inflict 10d6 HP acid and sickened 1 (save basic Reflex also negates sickened; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Revivifying Mutagen: (1) Ends the effects of a mutagen to regain 1d6 Hit Points per 2 levels of the mutagen
Smoke Bomb: Can craft bombs to also create smoke in a 10'-radius burst for 1 min
Sticky Bomb: Can craft bombs to inflict persistent damage equal to the splash damage
Sticky Poison: Poisoned weapon remains poisoned after a failed Strike with a successful DC 5 flat check, or until the end of the next turn after a successful Strike with a successful DC 17 flat check
Toxicologist: Can apply a poison to a weapon as a single action, and creatures immune to poison take acid damage instead/Versatile vials have the poison, not acid, trait and can be used to poison a weapon for the first successful Strike before the end of the current turn
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs reduce target cover Armor Class bonus by 1 and succeed automatically on the flat check to target a concealed creature
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Chemical Hardiness: Save Master (Fortitude)
Explosion Dodger: Save Master (Reflex)
Will Expertise: Save Expert (Will)
Advanced Vials (Mutagenist): Drinking a field vial gives resistance 10 to physical damage until the beginning of the next turn
Alchemical Revivification: After dying while under the effects of an elixir, returns to life at the start of the next turn with the effects of an elixir of rejuvenation, a true elixir of life, and a choice of a major bestial, juggernaut, or quicksilver mutagen, once every 1d4 hr
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Chemical Hardiness: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Explosion Dodger: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Field Discovery (Mutagenist): Can end a the effects of a mutagen to reroll a Fortitude save
Field Discovery (Toxicologist): Has poison resistance 10
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Mutagenist: Can drink a versatile vial to suppress a drawback from 1 mutagen until the start of the next turn
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Notes
Validation Errors:
Alchemist Research Field Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 47 allocated
